properties.displayName: Subnets should be associated with a Network Security Group
properties.description: Protect your subnet from potential threats by restricting access to it with a Network Security Group (NSG). NSGs contain a list of Access Control List (ACL) rules that allow or deny network traffic to your subnet.

metadata.description: Enable or disable the execution of the policy

Specifies when the existence of the related resources should be evaluated. The delay is only used for evaluations that are a result of a create or update resource request. Allowed values are AfterProvisioning, AfterProvisioningSuccess, AfterProvisioningFailure, or an ISO 8601 duration between 0 and 360 minutes.
